<div class="box">
	<div class="header">
		<div class="box-title">{{{ titleImg }}}</div>
	</div>
	<div class="body">
		<div style="height: {{{ height }}}px"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="footer">
		<div class="box-flower">[[File:花花.png]]</div>
	</div>
</div>
<bstyle>
.box {
padding: 10px;
}
.box-title{
float: left;
display: inline;
width: 48%;
position: absolute;
top: -20px;
left: 0px;
}
.box-flower{
float: left;
display: inline;
width: 48%;
position: absolute;
right: 0px;
}
.header {
width: 100%;
background-size: 100%,100%;
background-image: url(https://patchwiki.biligame.com/images/ygl/a/a6/ojoqyf4g7xs4dcw5643mplbbv6w3wve.png);
background-repeat: no-repeat,no-repeat;
background-attachment: scroll,scroll,scroll;
height: 29px;
position: relative;
}
.body{
width: 100%;
background-image: url(https://patchwiki.biligame.com/images/ygl/e/e9/o1ri7me0yoindvw9sonw1leyn0s1q8z.png);
background-size: 100%,100%;
background-attachment: scroll,scroll,scroll;
padding: 0 5%;
}
.footer{
width: 100%;
background-image: url(https://patchwiki.biligame.com/images/ygl/e/e0/h3pp02ukeb8fr827seiey00uzz2yqzs.png);
background-size: 100%,100%;
background-repeat: no-repeat,no-repeat;
background-attachment: scroll,scroll,scroll;
height: 70px;
position: relative;
}
</bstyle>
